review_data.title: Great Hotel Fare
review_data.content: The food is fresh and the friendly staff helps to make the meal pleasant. A full service bar is also available. There are plenty of choices and most appetites will be pleased.

review_data.title: Will not repeat
review_data.content: Food for dinner was great. But it was VERY and small portions. Breakfast was really, really bad. The scrambled eggs were like a shiny rubber substance, definitely not real. The juice was spoiled and fermented. I would rather eat at a McDonalds.

review_data.title: Delikat!

review_data.title: A pleasant surprise from a hotel bistro.
review_data.content: For an unfussy dinner when staying at the hotel it's perfect - no need to venture into the surrounds to find better. Had a very good burger here - as good as any 2nd-tier burger joints (in the UK: GBK, Byron) and the chips were...More

review_data.title: A nice surprise find
review_data.content: This is the restaurant within the Ibis Messe Hotel, serving a wide variety of international food. A real surprise find, with very good Swiss food served with a smile. Would recommend the rosti with bacon and cheese. Good hearty meal!

review_data.title: if you will stay at Ibis Zurich Messe, this is your reataurant if you do not want to go outside
review_data.content: this is the internal restaurant of the Ibis Zurich Messe hotel. It serves international dishes and specilaities of the swiss cuisine too. Considering that this is jus a bistro and a service-restaurant of the hotel, the quality is quite good. I suggest the typical swiss...More

review_data.title: Dinner at Swiss Bistro, Ibis Messe Zurich, business stay over
review_data.content: I chose the hotel because of its access location, car park and restaurant, which was just right for a single nights stay over, the menu had a decent selection, the quality was good as was the wine, breakfast was also well presented and various.
